26#include <sys/cdefs.h>
27__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_mc_nv50.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:34 riastradh Exp $");
28
29#include "priv.h"
30
31const struct nvkm_mc_intr
32nv50_mc_intr[] = {
33 { 0x04000000, NVKM_ENGINE_DISP }, /* DISP before FIFO, so pageflip-timestamping works! */
34 { 0x00000001, NVKM_ENGINE_MPEG },
35 { 0x00000100, NVKM_ENGINE_FIFO },
36 { 0x00001000, NVKM_ENGINE_GR },
37 { 0x00004000, NVKM_ENGINE_CIPHER }, /* NV84- */
38 { 0x00008000, NVKM_ENGINE_BSP }, /* NV84- */
39 { 0x00020000, NVKM_ENGINE_VP }, /* NV84- */
40 { 0x00100000, NVKM_SUBDEV_TIMER },
41 { 0x00200000, NVKM_SUBDEV_GPIO }, /* PMGR->GPIO */
42 { 0x00200000, NVKM_SUBDEV_I2C }, /* PMGR->I2C/AUX */
43 { 0x10000000, NVKM_SUBDEV_BUS },
44 { 0x80000000, NVKM_ENGINE_SW },
45 { 0x0002d101, NVKM_SUBDEV_FB },
46 {},
47};
48
49void
50nv50_mc_init(struct nvkm_mc *mc)
51{
52 struct nvkm_device *device = mc->subdev.device;
53 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x000200, 0xffffffff); /* everything on */
54}
55
56static const struct nvkm_mc_func
57nv50_mc = {
58 .init = nv50_mc_init,
59 .intr = nv50_mc_intr,
60 .intr_unarm = nv04_mc_intr_unarm,
61 .intr_rearm = nv04_mc_intr_rearm,
62 .intr_mask = nv04_mc_intr_mask,
63};
64
65int
66nv50_mc_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_mc **pmc)
67{
68 return nvkm_mc_new_(&nv50_mc, device, index, pmc);
69}
70
